price: Xhamitë i janë kushtuar vetëm Allahut, prandaj mos iu lutni askujt krahas Allahut!
arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wa-anna al-masājida lillahi falā tadʿū maʿa al-lahi aḥadan
